item.title: Most Consecutive Years with a New Starter on Opening Day
item.description: Throughout 2020, I have helped answer baseball research questions for the FanGraphs podcast “Effectively Wild.” Every couple of weeks, one of the hosts will reach out to be asking if I can find the answer to a baseball history question for a segment known as a “Stat Blast.” To answer the questions, I have largely used two databases: a Retrosheet database I have on my own laptop (set up using a tutorial from Bill Petti at https://billpetti.
